attributes.background: Petition to have sadiq khan's tfl finances looked into by full audit and puplished to the puplic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Transport for London falls within the responsibility of the Greater London Authority and London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
